All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ApartmentValidator
Utility class for validating apartment address input.
CityValidator
Utility class for validating city input.
Contact
The Contact class is used in adding, updating and reading contacts from the contacts database.
ContactButton
The ContactButton class is used in listing contacts and in retrieving their personal information from the database.
ContactDatabase
The ContactDatabase class is used in the database csv file handling.
ContactsApp
The ContactsApp class serves as the entry point to the application, which is a simple contacts application where user can create, read, update and delete Finnish contacts from a csv file.
EmailValidator
Utility class for validating email address input.
ForenameValidator
Utility class for validating first name input.
GuiAddUpdate
 
GuiContact
 
GuiFrame
The GuiFrame class extends JFrame and implements ActionListener.
GuiInvalidInput
 
GuiList
 
GuiMode
The GuiMode class is used to set the different states of the GUI.
IdCodeValidator
Utility class for validating finnish personal ID number input.
PhoneValidator
Utility class for validating finnish mobile phone number input.
PostalCodeValidator
Utility class for validating finnish postal code input.
StreetAddressValidator
Utility class for validating street address input.
SurnameValidator
Utility class for validating last name input.
